website_summaries.verdict: A cute option if you are looking for a Christmas sweater for your pooch, but it's not as well made as others we considered.
pros: An adorable choice for holiday wear – features reindeer design in red and white
Available in a range of sizes up to 26-inch chest girth
cons: Material feels thin compared to others on our list, and it runs on the small side
Some holes and tears have been reported after repeated wear
Holds up best if it's not put in the dryer

customer_reviews.title: My Staffie loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Prob the most satisfying 3am beer fueled purchase yet, and the dog likes it/fits his weirdly shaped body.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great sweaters for my dogs. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great sweaters for my dogs. After reading reviews, I determined to order an extra large and a large for my dogs. They fit perfect. Quality material and great for Christmas, or the winter in general. Very satisfied. The large fits my French bulldog and the extra large fits my pitbull.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGunnar

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but be sure of your dog's size!
customer_reviews.text: I'm posting as 5 stars because it's really cute and well made but, due to the reviews, I ordered a size up for my 18 pound girl. Mistake sigh. It was too big on her. I don't know if folks think their dogs are smaller than they actually are but mine had just been weighed that day so I figured I was safe. I did manage a picture but her legs won't stay in the holes and the neck slides down so it's not something I can keep her in for long. I'll get a size down...a medium.
customer_reviews.author: doggy momma

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my little short hair warm!
customer_reviews.text: Great sweater and fits pretty good on my little dog. He's a short hair and loves his new sweater. It's a bit of a "football sweater" as in it's heavy in the front but it's a Christmas sweater so how can you go wrong. Nice and soft too! I'd buy another one but a different color from the same company again. Oh yes, he weighs 7.5 pounds and from neck to base if tail he's ten inches. The underside doesn't get wet when he pees!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great, it's super soft and leaves enough space at ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a small 18lb Shih tzu, and I ordered a size M. It fit him perfectly! He absolutely LOVES it. The quality is great, it's super soft and leaves enough space at the bottom for him to use the washroom without dirtying himself. Machine washable! You MUST buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tiny!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sweater and I'm excited to have it! It does run VERY small though. My 50 pound dog has the XL and it's tight across his chest but for the adorable factor and considering how rarely he'll be wearing it, I think I can deal.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kay

customer_reviews.title: XL too small for my 50 pound hound
customer_reviews.text: XL fit my dog everywhere but the chest. I guess he has an extra long ribcage. It was very hard to get his legs in the sleeves and once I did, the underarm seams were cutting into him. I measure him and thought it would work, but it was just too tight under his front legs. 4 stars because the sweater itself is great, I just need a bigger size (that they don't make).
customer_reviews.author: Emily Troutman

customer_reviews.title: White one is sized better and fits better than the red one.
customer_reviews.text: I have both the white and red sweaters for my 10 pound Schnoodle. I bought the white one first in a small. The red one is made a little differently than the white. The white one had the front legs' openings at the seam where the stomach meets the back. It is a true small. The red one has small cuffs that are knitted into the sweater. The red sweater is tighter than the white one and the leg openings are a bit off to allow it to fit correctly--they are up on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it!!! My dog is a cocker spaniel small she weighs about 20 pounds but i got her a size medium because I read the reviews on how small they ran so it fit her perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: elisa

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my cat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 pound cat! I got a medium and it fits her great. She does not completely hate it either, so that's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: rws312

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and was super cute. I ordered an xs for my 2 lbs maltipoo.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Sizes irresponsibly way too small
customer_reviews.text: What they label as a medium, I view as an extra small. That MIGHT fit a cat, but it sure as heck won't fit a medium dog. I'm guessing what is done is that the sweater is measured fully extended including the neck and that length is 'added' as part of the back. If I washed this once it would make a good mitten. Sure, shame on me for labeling that as a medium when it's extra small. It's partially my fault, but it's a flat out lie that this would fit a medium dog. Mislabeled / irresponsible.
customer_reviews.author: Fergus

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dad's dog, and she loves it! The quality is excellent, and it keeps her nice and warm. This tends to run a little small. My dad's dog is about 12 lbs, and the medium fit perfectly. My sister ordered a large for her 45 lb labradoodle, and the XL for her 55 lb lab mix. The sweaters fit the bigger dogs, but were a bit snug and short. We were unable to fold the sweater collar over on the bigger dogs. This sweater really looks much better on smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: Cute sweater
customer_reviews.text: I got this sweater for my chihuahua who is a little overweight. It fits him well except around the leg holes. There’s an odd gap. It is ok putting it on and taking it off—not really difficult, but a little harder than some other styles I have used. Having said that, I like the color and design on the sweater, and it seems to keep the chill away.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: ... a little snug on my husky but she looked great and I had the sweater to match
customer_reviews.text: It was a little snug on my husky but she looked great and I had the sweater to match!
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Snow sweaters
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these sweaters, one for my baby and one for the neighbors dog that is at our house all the time. LOL They are buddy's. They enjoy having the same sweater and this is is very well made and rather heavy than most keeping these fur babies warm in the winter weather. A great find, they are very, very cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Pitbull loves it, but neck is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 60 lb. pitbull for a silly ugly sweater photo for our Christmas cards (yes, dogs and humans had embarrassing sweaters. It was awesome.) The neck is HUGE. Comically so. It stretched out and ended up around his shoulders by the end of the day. The arm holes are also a little challenging to get a wiggling, extra excited dog into. That said, our dog loves it and always wants to wear it, so I guess there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: he looked like he was wearing a crop top and needed some ...
customer_reviews.text: It was way to small for my 90 pound gsd, he looked like he was wearing a crop top and needed some pants. Also, it was difficult to get his legs in the arm holes. I won't return it because we stretched it and I didn't feel comfortable returning it in that condition.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wensel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Like most animals, I feel like my dog was a little embarrassed having to wear some people type clothing. Of course, I think most dogs have a little social anxiety when they take a dump in front of people, too. Maybe I'm projecting my own feelings on the animal, but I think my pup looks handsome in this sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Will Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Chest area does not have a pattern, just solid red
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice enough sweater but the design does not extend around to the chest so that if you have your dog's photo taken sitting facing the camera as we wanted to do, you get a dog in a red sweater, not a dog in a festive reindeer sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Nichegirl

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, but not comfy for my doggo
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute. My dog is about 62 pounds lean and not at all fluffy. It fits him great, I kind of went with my gut as far as sizing. The only part that doesn't fit him great is the sleeves. The stitching on them is really tight, so his front leg movement is restricted and ends up walking weird. I wouldn't keep this on him for very long, but I'll keep it because it's so GOSH DARN CUTE.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The small fit my 6 pound chihuahua perfectly! It was not too snug, nor too loose. She normally hates wearing clothes, but didn't seem to mind this sweater as much as others, so I guess it was comfortable! It is well made too. No snags or defects.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Henry

customer_reviews.title: The sweater seemed to be good quality however the measurements were way off
customer_reviews.text: The sweater seemed to be good quality however the measurements were way off. I ordered the largest size hoping it would fit my standard poodle and it was like I was trying to squeeze him into a Small even though his measurements matched up with the supposed (L) measurements listed for the item. Would recommend for small to medium size dogs only, be aware it runs very small.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, durable & washes great! Keeps your dog warm for the holiday season.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my neighbor’s 70 lb Pitbull/Lab mix and it was so beautiful! We all had our dogs dressed to perfection this past Christmas! I will repurchase from this brand, for my own German Spitz. If you own a black dog, this red & white sweater will look beautiful on them 😄.
customer_reviews.author: A Senile Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great sweater for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is excellent! I was skeptical because its acrylic but it's really nicely made with a lot of give for the dogs. The XS fits our 4 lb puppy and the XXL is perfect on our 67 pound Australian Shepherd. So glad I took a chance, they look great in them!
customer_reviews.author: K. Pollinger

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My cat is about 10 pounds and fit into a small. My sister's dog is around 13-15 pounds and wore a medium and my parents' dog, 30 pounds, fit well in a large. Adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Katiekins

customer_reviews.title: Tobywas the center of our Christmas, in this sweater.
customer_reviews.text: Cute sweater. It's a pullover, and fit over Toby's head just fine. When we leave for the day, I turn the thermostat down, so this sweater keeps him warm and toasty. I've washed it a few times without any problems. Toby is a 22lb mutt, and the large size fits him perfectly. This sweater has sleeves, and a lot of them don't. A selling point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daffodilmom

customer_reviews.title: Way to small don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible wish I can give a zero stars! Should of listened to the comments ! My dog is a size medium but from the comments I order a size up and guess what still wayyy to small! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mini pins so they could be a matched set at Christmas. The fit nicely "XS" for the 1 year old and "S" for the 12 year old. Most important though, the bottom area of the sweater is shorter so it does not cover where pee come out.
customer_reviews.author: LindaG

customer_reviews.title: Funnier for me than for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was hilarious in this sweater; she kept rolling around trying to get it off. I got the small and probably would have been better with the medium - maybe it would have been more comfortable for her. She wasn’t pleased about the situation, so it won’t be worn for warmth this winter, but we did get some funny photos out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fit very good
customer_reviews.text: Great sweater. Fits nicely. Have an 18 lb silky terrier lab mix. The red color true to picture. Very festive. My dog loves sweaters and this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: TW - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Sweater A+
customer_reviews.text: We Have a 13 Year Old Shih Tzu He’s Cold Nature He Weighs 12Lbs Fixed Perfect Great material Heavy Duty Warm And She’s Loves it
customer_reviews.author: ken pike

customer_reviews.title: Return was fast and simple
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large for my 45lb mix. It was too small for her, but returning it was fast and simple. I had already ordered a few other types of sweaters, otherwise I would have gotten a replacement. Even though it was too small, it was decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but too small.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 8-lb cat. Measured her, and ordered based on her measurements, and the XS sweater is too small. Looks like I need a S instead. Hope I can exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, and adorable
customer_reviews.text: My adorable pug is a small dog, but she's packed on some weight over the years, and not much in the way of a neck, so I didn't want anything restricting her. I got a large for her. It's soft, warm, and perfect. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: The small looks absolutely adorable on my eight week old corgi puppy. The neck is a bit long but I rolled it down for her comfort. She may not realize how cute she looks (and tbh she did try to get it off at first) but it isn't that uncomfortable since she promptly forgot she had it on for the next four hours. There is a little stretch but not much, which means she will probably outgrow this very fast but hey, it's a seasonal item anyways!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Deanna Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Needs work
customer_reviews.text: Needs improvement in the leg part and underneath should be curved for the boys my boys pee on them not made boy friendly My dogs can get out of them easily
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Bentley’s New Christmas Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today & put it on Bentley, he’s not a fan of wearing anything but seems ok with this sweater. He looks adorable. It’s a little tight in the chest but I think a large would be too long on his back.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas sweater
customer_reviews.text: Nice, thick material. Well made and fits my pug great! She is a fat pug. Larger dog breeds may need to go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive sweater.. All the male dogs in our area having been giving my little girl the waggie tail.. It's warm and thick..works for chilly days..
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: Cute Sweater!!
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie loves wearing her sweater. She wore it through the Christmas holidays and winter. She is wearing today as well since we are having a cold rainy day in NC. It has held up well without any problem. Her back is 13-14 inches and I believe I got her a medium if I remember correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Motte

customer_reviews.title: Too small for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: Cute but XL was way too small for our 85# lab type dog and shes not chubby just tall and long. Shrank even a bit further after washing too.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Seslar

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Check size chart
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check the size chart. Usually an XS fits him, so I didn’t check. He actually doesn’t mind this one and it’s cute so 5 stars anyway
customer_reviews.author: T Knight

customer_reviews.title: Cute sweater = Happy dog.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog, Ernie, has been a happier dog after getting this sweater. Honestly! He sleeps better because he is warm. He has been photographed constantly in it. We got a LARGE for a 32 pound labradoodle. Fits well. Ernie even brings his sweater to me when it is in the laundry!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is adorable and not itchy
customer_reviews.text: It is adorable and not itchy, but my little dachshund hates it. She acts like it's a straight jacket. She only likes jackets that don't restrict her legs in any way. These have little sleeves. Maybe it's the fact that she has very short little legs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfy pup sweater!
customer_reviews.text: My 60 lb pitbull mix likes it. She is in a size XL. I wish it was a little bit longer, but overall fits well. She seems to like it. I like that the neckline fits my dogs big chest.
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Sweater for a Decent Price - Size XL- Loose Neck Hole
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size XL for my Fur Baby and he absolutely loves it; the neck hole runs just a bit big but for the money it is absolutely worth it! He is a Pitbull about 75 lbs and fits his funny adorable shaped body! I don’t think you could get a better sweater for this kind of money. 💕
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Enloe

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic sweater and fit perfectly as I went by the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic sweater and fit perfectly as I went by the suggested measurements of the seller. Beware of sharp nails snagging the sweater. Looks adorable and my 7 pound girl is cozy all day! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are not as listed. This sweater was ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizes are not as listed. This sweater was ordered in a size large for my 65 lb dog. It was so small, it would be more appropriate for a Corgi.
customer_reviews.author: sarah rysdam

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I would say this product runs a little small- it was very tight on my dog. I got an XL and my dog is a lab and it was very snug on him. Overall great quality and so cute for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Adorable, soft, durable! Be sure to measure your dog prior to buying. I bought a large for my Pit Bull. I should have gotten an extra large for his large chest. Nevertheless, he wore it. Loved it and it’s holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: love this product

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size XS (Not XXS). It fits my 5 lb chihuahua perfectly. Easy on and off. He really looks cute in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Not High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this sweater. There were a few stray pieces when I put it on my pup. After an hour of wear, it was ripping at multiple seams and multiple pieces were coming off. I got this for a cute sweater for him to wear when I went home for the holidays. I was embarrassed to leave it on him and ended up taking it off. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Very cute fit small cat perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Cat was not really a fan of this sweater, probably too hot for her as a long haired cat. Great fabric, looked very cute. Fit perfectly. She’s about 6-8lbs
customer_reviews.author: Kat Here

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for my kitten to wear for our christmas family photos! She hated it (understandably) but it was definitely cute. I do think it runs small, though. Even for a smaller kitten it fit quite snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Sweaters
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our two 30 pound golden doodles Christmas photos. They are very well made and a great price for the quality. We are very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lil Sweater
customer_reviews.text: My dog - 55lb pitbull mix - loved this sweater. Not only did it fit him well, he looked quite dashing in it. It also seemed to calm him down - he's often quite excitable - probably since he felt like he was being held. This was his first sweater - or article of clothing in general, really - so the sensation was quite new. Great article, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Backhaus

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, inaccurate dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this design, but the dimensions are MUCH SMALLER than they said they would be. I have a medium-large dog with long fur, and most extra large things are perfect to almost too big for her. The extra large I ordered was like watching Chris Farley in Tommy Boy do the "fat guy in a little coat" song. (if you don't know what that is, go watch Tommy Boy, and you will laugh.)
customer_reviews.author: Dana Peters

customer_reviews.title: Sizing seems to run small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in a medium for my 20lb dachshund. Fits a little snug, probably should have ordered a large.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful pattern
customer_reviews.text: Super, super cute sweater. But even the XL was too small for my Bella baby. Is there a better way to communicate the sizing? The fabric is soft and the pattern is beautiful. It’s a great product, just not for us!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. A bit larger then expected but shrunk in the wash to appropriate size.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sanocki

customer_reviews.title: The neck is absolutely enormous. My dog is half ...
customer_reviews.text: The neck is absolutely enormous. My dog is half out of the sweater every morning because the neck is so large. I have a 41-pound, lithe, agile, English Springer Spaniel. The XL fits her perfectly, but the neck of the sweater is much too large.
customer_reviews.author: Korr

customer_reviews.title: Cute, soft, snug
customer_reviews.text: I'm crying this sweater is so cute! I'm not a cat so I can't speak to its true comfort but it is softer than I expected. Great price for the quality, and I think my cat actually doesn't mind it that much, and she hates everything I put on her. . Note: This sweater is super small. My cat is between 6-7 lbs and the Small (NOT XS) fit her snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Manning

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: MY CAT LOOKS SO CUTE IN IT except she just doesn’t like to wear it. kind of hard to get cat into and she doesn’t know how to walk in it but it’s just so gosh dang cute on
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: Measured by dog and it seemed to think it would work but no. Not even close! Not for large dogs I have two American Bull dogs 65-70lb large chests didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sweater, and although my cat didn’t at first, he got used to it haha we got it for our holiday picture and it was perfect, plus it’s super soft and seems very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend’s puppy—This is soft, warm and sturdy, as well as completely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 63lb boxer
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 63lb boxer. It gets a little stretched out but regains it size after a wash. My good boy loves it so much he tries to nip at me when I take it off. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and fits perfectly. I have a 6pound ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and fits perfectly. I have a 6pound dog . Only thing I don’t think it’s warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Abercrombie Model
customer_reviews.text: Made my cat look like an Abercrombie and Fitch Model- so needless to say it’s cute AF
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Favorite Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out and falls off
customer_reviews.text: Good price and fits as the measurements describe. But the neck stretches out and eventually Bongo the Italian Gteyhound slithers out of his sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable aweater
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for our 15 pound Shih-poo and he looks so cute in it. It appears to be good quality and is a wonderful shade of red. Very happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: And it is great for those cold mornings when is short-haired God-given coat ...
customer_reviews.text: Woof! (Fergus would give it two thumbs up but, he lacks an opposable thumb.) As an independent observer I can say he looks especially handsome in this—everyone says how cute he is and, come on! He's a pit bull so that says something. And it is great for those cold mornings when is short-haired God-given coat does not cut it -- no insult to God, but this really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and decided to go with a Medium, should have gone with a small, still fits well. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jntey

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Large size did not fit my 69 pound Rhodesian Ridgeback. And judging by how tight an XL would be too small also.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable. Good quality BUT I got a large which ended being too small for my dog. My dog is a medium size one... i’d Definitely get a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Lais Hough

customer_reviews.title: Fits my dog perfectly and is warm
customer_reviews.text: I like that this sweater has partial front legs knit into them for added warmth. This fits my dog well and is so darn cute. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LingLing

customer_reviews.title: Super cute dog sweaters
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my two dogs and they looked so cute for our Christmas eve celebration. I got a L for my 35 lb schnauzer and an xs for my 6 lb yorkie. They fitted perfectly. The material is very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Jackeline Vindell

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought a medium for my 45 lb blue healer to visit grammys house for xmas in northeast. Fits him perfect, maybe a little snug but comfortable for him. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super cute sweater, but came out of bag COVERED in fur. It was purchased new as a gift. It’s super cute but can’t be given as a gift because it’s covered in some random animals hair. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Chali Dina

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and ample.
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is adorable - and is AMPLY big! It was for my brother's dog - I went by measurements, but goes beyond to cover part of his tail! Still, very cute.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Love this Christmas sweater
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and warm Christmas sweater. The little arm sleeves are so cute too. True to size for my yorkie!!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Holiday look for your pooch
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 7lb chihuahua perfectly and great for the holidays. Keeps her warm of course.
customer_reviews.author: Alba O

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with 23" size but otherwise very cute
customer_reviews.text: the sweater is strong and cute but I had to return- I bought the 23" long back length for my dachshund mix and it was also wide in the width it is actually an XXL so just warning if anyone else has a similar need!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann

customer_reviews.title: So cute, but bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Unraveled very fast, but good if only using for Xmas pics once or twice
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Kinosian

customer_reviews.title: It's adorable on my medium+ sized cat
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable on my medium+ sized cat. It's also stretchy enough that it was super easy to pull onto my cat (and that's saying a lot!).
customer_reviews.author: mb rogers

customer_reviews.title: Reindeer dog sweater
customer_reviews.text: Too small, order up at least one size or more
customer_reviews.author: Zebra

customer_reviews.title: cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my cat and it runs 2 sizes too small.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Loved it - seams started tearing after a few weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it - seams started tearing after a few weeks but it was a novelty item just for fun so I'm still pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, used them for Christmas card photos. Not sure the boys loved them as much as I did. They fit well, I went a size bigger just in case seeing as how they don’t wear clothes all the time. But I was glad I did, going the suggested size might have been too snug for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very small.
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. We got the large and it barely fit our 28 pound dog. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear C.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: So cute but it was way too small for my 53pounds golden doodle
customer_reviews.author: G. nam

customer_reviews.title: Annabelle's Sweater
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweater for our pug! Fits perfectly & she looks really festive in it. Seems to be good quality & well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrydeg

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Weimaraner since it says XL sweater for large dogs but it isn't even close to fitting him. It fits my Scottish terrier (25lbs) perfectly so we'all keep it but that is not the dog that I bought it for. So I guess if you consider a Scottish terrier a "large dog" the labeling is appropriate but I disagree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loved putting it on, seemed to get excited about it. Also had no irritation while having it on. Plus he looked cute af
customer_reviews.author: brau

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased until it started unraveling
customer_reviews.text: Very cute on my dog and it looked like it was nice quality for the price but it started unraveling within 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: I bought this sweater for my dog, be careful ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sweater for my dog, be careful it runs small so it’s a little tight on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: jdb6602

customer_reviews.title: ... particular sweater fit both my bunnies and my cats comfortably. If you're a crazy animal person
customer_reviews.text: This particular sweater fit both my bunnies and my cats comfortably. If you're a crazy animal person, this sweater is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: RedRabbit

customer_reviews.title: I love this a lot more than my cat does
customer_reviews.text: I love this a lot more than my cat does, but she looks adorable and it fits nicely - size Small for 8.5 lb cat. Actually, it has a calming effect like a thundershirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elderly cat loves
customer_reviews.text: Elderly cat loves it! Helps keep him warm. I fold down the collar cuz he doesn’t like it too high up on his neck.
customer_reviews.author: CWN

product_meta.title: Lanyar Dog Reindeer Holiday Pet Clothes Sweater for Dogs Puppy Kitten Cats, Classic Red
product_meta.description: Size:X-Large (Back length 20" Girth 22- 26" )Perfect as your pooch's Santa Xmas gift.Classic dog sweater cold winter clothes warm and cozy for your dogs.Made of 100% acrylic.XS Size: back length 10", neck girth 12", chest girth 12- 14";S Size: back length 12", neck girth 12", chest girth 14- 16";M Size: back length 13", neck girth 13", chest girth 16- 18";L Size: back length 16", neck girth 16", chest girth 18- 20";XL Size: back length 20", neck girth 20", chest girth 22- 26".XXL Size: back length 23", neck girth 23", chest girth 28- 34".

Classic x-large dog sweater cold winter clothes warm and cozy for your dogs
Made of 100% acrylic; Machine wash in cold water Line dry
